SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.nebularis.defproxy.annotations
Annotation Type ProxyDelegated

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface ProxyDelegated

This annotation explicitly marks a method as delegated, allowing you to specify the underlying method name or provide an invocation handler class. It is an error to supply both the methodName() and methodInvocationHandler() properties on a mapped field.

Optional Element Summary
 java.lang.Class<? extends MethodInvoker> methodInvocationHandler
          Optional.
 java.lang.String methodName
          Optional.
 

methodName

public abstract java.lang.String methodName
Optional. Indicates the method name in the back-end to which calls should be delegated. Where overloads are present, the method's type signature will be used to determine the correct callee. Example: 
      @ProxyInterface(delegate=Baz.class)
      public interface Foo {

          // this method will be resolved to a fully compatible signature in Baz.class
          String bar(final String name, final int age);

          // this method will be resolved to a method `String flobby(void)` in Baz.class
          @ProxyDelegated(methodName="flobby")
          String clobber();
      }
This value is ignored if the methodInvocationHandler() option has been set. Otherwise, this value is required.

Returns:
Default:
""

methodInvocationHandler

public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends MethodInvoker> methodInvocationHandler
Optional. Indicates a type which, once instantiated, will handle the calls to the back-end. Example: 
      @ProxyInterface(delegate=Baz.class)
      public interface Foo {

          // this method will be resolved to a compatible signature in Baz.class
          @ProxyDelegated(methodInvocationHandler=MyClass.class)
          String bar(final String name, final int age);

      }
This value is ignored if the methodName() option has been set. Otherwise, this value is required.

Returns:
Default:
org.nebularis.defproxy.introspection.MethodInvoker.class
